title: Preferred online retail payment methods worldwide 2017
summary: This is a bar chart representing Payment Method in the x axis and Share of online shoppers in the y axis.
The Share of online shoppers is appeared to be the highest at Payment Method Credit cards and lowest at Payment Method Cryptocurrencies (Bitcoin).
There is a difference of 39.0 between the maximum Payment Method Credit cards and minimum Payment Method Cryptocurrencies (Bitcoin).
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of online shoppers for 9 number of Payment Methods.
The maximum Share of online shoppers 42.0 is found at Payment Method Credit cards and the minimum is found at Cryptocurrencies (Bitcoin) where Payment Method is 3.0.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Payment Method in the x axis and Share of online shoppers in the y axis.
The Share of online shoppers is appeared to be the highest at Payment Method Credit cards and lowest at Payment Method Cryptocurrencies (Bitcoin).
There is a difference of 39.0 between the maximum Payment Method Credit cards and minimum Payment Method Cryptocurrencies (Bitcoin).
max_summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Payment Method, and Share of online shoppers in each Payment Method on the y axis.
The Share of online shoppers is appeared to be the highest at Payment Method Credit cards and lowest at Payment Method Cryptocurrencies (Bitcoin).
Payment Method Electronic payment (PayPal if available) has the second highest value for Share of online shoppers.
The difference of Share of online shoppers between the highest and lowest Payment Method is 39.0.
Share of online shoppers at Payment Method Credit cards is 42.0 , second place is Electronic payment (PayPal if available) at 39.0, and thirdly is Debit cards at 28.0.
Payment Method Cryptocurrencies (Bitcoin), and Other have a similar Share of online shoppers that is 3.0.
Considered together, the average Share of online shoppers in all 9 Payment Methods is roughly 20.78.
